extends AbstractHookableCmdHandler<RcptHook>

      • doCoreCmd

        protected Response doCoreCmd(SMTPSession session,
                 String command,
                 String parameters)
        Handler method called upon receipt of a RCPT command. Reads recipient. Does some connection validation.
        Specified by:
        doCoreCmd in class AbstractHookableCmdHandler<RcptHook>
        Parameters:
        session - SMTP session object
        command - command passed
        parameters - parameters passed in with the command by the SMTP client
        Returns:
        smtp response
